reviews.name: Belmond Mount Nelson
reviews.review: Beautiful hotel nestled in the center of Cape Town. Fantastic lobby bar for a late night cocktail or smoke with patrons from all over the world. Beautiful rooms with small balconies overlooking the luxurious pool or mountain ranges.

reviews.name: St. James
reviews.review: Old world hotel tucked away in a less traveled part of the city, near the Arc de Triomphe.

reviews.name: Benoit
reviews.review: Michelin star establishment in the 16th arrondismont, great escargot.
